DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Randomized controlled trial aim assess stress level nurse staff review auriculotherapy effectiveness semi-permanent needle seed .
DOC.brief_title: Application Auriculotherapy Nursing Professional Stress Levels
DOC.detailed_description: Seventy five participant average high score Stress Symptoms List ( LSS ) divide 3 group ( control , needle seed ) . They evaluate baseline , fourth eighth session 15-day follow-up receive 8 session Shenmen , Kidney Brainstem point .
